Hatta ke jab [yeh ahani deewaar(iron-wall)] bilkul aag ki tarah surkh(red-hot) ho gayi to usne kaha “ lao, ab main ispar pigla hua taamba (molten brass) undailunga (pour)”
(yeh bandh aisa tha ke) yaajuj o maajuj ispar chadh kar bhi na aa saktey thay aur ismein naqab lagana (scale over it) unke liye aur bhi mushkil tha
Zul-Qarnain ne kaha “yeh mere Rubb ki rehmat hai, magar jab mere Rubb ke wadey ka waqt aayega to woh isko paiwand e khaak kardega, aur mere Rubb ka wada bar-haqq hai”

Aur us roz hum logon ko chodh denge ke (samandar ki maujon ki tarah) ek dusre se gutham gutha (come close together tumultuously) hon aur sur (trumphet) phoonka jaayega aur hum sab Insaano ko ek saath jamaa karenge
Aur woh din hoga jab hum jahannum ko kafiron ke saamne layenge
Un kafiron ke saamne jo meri naseehat ki taraf se andhey baney huey thay aur kuch sunne keliye tayyar hi na thay

To kya yeh log, jinhon ne kufr ikhtiyar kiya hai, yeh khayal rakhte hain ke mujhey chodh kar mere bandon ko apna kaarsaaz bana lein? Humne aisey kafiron ki ziyafat ke liye jahannum tayyar kar rakkhi hai
(Aey Muhammad), insey kaho, kya hum tumhein batayein ke apne aamaal mein sabse zyada nakaam o na-murad log kaun hain
Woh ke duniya ki zindagi mein jinki saari saii-o-jahad (endeavours/ efforts) raah e raast se bhatki rahi aur woh samajhte rahey ke woh sab kuch theek kar rahey hain

Yeh woh log hain jinhon ne apne Rubb ki aayat ko maanne se inkar kiya aur uske huzoor pehsi ka yaqeen na kiya. Isliye unke saarey aamal zaaya ho gaye, qayamat ke roz hum unhein koi wazan(weight) na denge
Unki jaza jahannum hai us kufr ke badle jo unhon ne kiya aur us mazaaq ki padash mein jo woh meri aayat aur mere Rasoolon ke saath karte rahey
Albattta woh log jo iman laye aur jinhon ne neik amal kiya, unki mezbani ke liye firdous ke baagh hongey
Jin mein woh hamesha rahenge aur kabhi us jagah se nikal kar kahin janey ko unka jee na chahega

(Aey Muhammad), kaho ke agar samandar mere Rubb ki baatein likhne ke liye roshnayi(ink) ban jaye to woh khatam ho jaye magar mere Rubb ki baatein khatam na hon, balke itni hi roshnayi aur le aayein to woh bhi kifayat na karey

(Aey Muhammad), kaho ke main to ek Insaan hoon tum hi jaisa, meri taraf wahee ki jaati hai ke tumhara khuda bas ek hi khuda hai, pas jo koi apne Rubb ki mulaqaat ka umeedwar ho usey chahiye ke neik amal karey aur bandagi mein apne Rubb ke saath kisi aur ko shareek na karey
Kaaf , Haa , yaa, ain , saad
Zikr hai us rehmat ka jo tere Rubb ne apne banday zakariya par ki thi
Jabke usne apne Rubb ko chupke chupke pukara
Usne arz kiya “aey parwardigar, meri haddiyan tak ghul gayi hain aur sar budhape se bhadak utha hai, aey parwardigar, main kabhi tujhse dua maang kar na-murad nahin raha
Mujhey apne peechey apne bhai bandon ki buraiyon ka khauf hai, aur meri biwi baanjh (barren) hai, tu mujhey apne fazal e khaas se ek waris ata karde
Jo mera bhi ho aur aale yaqub ki miras bhi paye, aur aey parwardigar , usko ek pasandeeda Insaan bana”
(Jawab diya gaya) “Aey zakariya, hum tujhe ek ladke ki basharat dete hain jiska naam Yahya hoga, humne is naam ka koi aadmi issey pehle paida nahin kiya”
Arz kiya, “parwardigar, bhala mere haan kaise beta hoga jabke meri biwi baanjh (barren) hai aur main boodha hokar sookh chuka hoon?”
Jawab mila “aisa hi hoga. Tera Rubb farmata hai ke yeh to mere liye ek zara si baat hai, aakhir issey pehle main tujhey paida kar chuka hoon jabke tu koi cheez na tha”
Zakariya ne kaha, “parwardigar, mere liye koi nishani muqarrar karde”. Farmaya “tere liye nishani yeh hai ke tu paiham teen din logon se baat na kar sakey”
Chunachey woh mehrab se nikal kar apni qaum ke saamne aaya aur usne isharey se unko hidayat ki ke subh-o-shaam tasbeeh karo
Aey Yahya! Kitab e ilahi ko mazboot thaam le, humne usey bachpan hi mein “hukum” se nawaza
Aur apni taraf se usko narm dili aur paakeezgi ata ki aur woh bada parheizgaar
Aur apne walidain ka haqq shanaas (dutiful ) tha, woh jabbar(arrogant) na tha aur na nafarman
Salaam uspar jis roz ke woh paida hua aur jis din marey aur jis roz woh zinda karke uthaya jaye
Aur (aey Muhammad), is kitaab mein Maryam ka haal bayan karo, jabke woh apne logon se alag ho kar sharqi (eastern side) janib gosha nasheen (in seclusion) ho gayi thi
Aur purda daal kar unse chup (hidden) baithi thi is halat mein humne uske paas apni rooh ko (yani farishte ko) bheja aur woh uske saamne ek puray Insan ki shakal mein namudar ho gaya
Maryam yakayak bol uthi ke “agar tu koi khuda tars aadmi hai to main tujhse rehman ki panaah maangti hoon”
Usne kaha “main to tere Rubb ka faristada hoon aur isliye bheja gaya hoon ke tujhey ek paakeeza ladka doon”
Maryam ne kaha “ mere haan kaise ladka hoga jabke mujhey kisi bashar (Insaan) ne chua tak nahin hai aur main koi badhkaar aurat nahin hoon”

Farishte ne kaha “ aisa hi hoga, tera Rubb farmata hai ke aisa karna mere liye bahut aasaan hai aur hum yeh isliye karenge ke us ladke ko logon ke liye ek nishani banayein aur apni taraf se ek rehmat, aur yeh kaam hokar rehna hai”
Mayam ko us bacchey ka hamal reh gaya aur woh is hamal ko liye huey ek door ke maqaam par chali gayi
Phir zachgi (delivery) ki takleef ne usey ek khajoor ke darakht ke nichey pahucha diya. Woh kehne lagi “kaash main issey pehle hi marr jati aur mera naam o nishan na rehta”
Farishtey ne paintey (at the foot of her bed) se usko pukar kar kaha “ghum na kar tere Rubb ne tere nichey ek chashma rawan kardiya hai
Aur tu zara is darakht ke tanay (trunk) ko hila, tere upar tarr-o-taaza khajoorein tapak padengi
Pas tu kha aur pee aur apni aankhein thandi kar phir agar koi aadmi tujhey nazar aaye to ussey kehde ke maine rehman ke liye roze ki nazar maani hai, isliye aaj main kisi se na bolungi”
Phir woh is bacchey ko liye huey apni qaum mein aayi. Log kehne lagey “aey Maryam, yeh tu nay bada paap kar daala
Aey Haroon ki behan, na tera baap koi bura aadmi tha aur na teri Maa hi koi badhkar aurat thi”
Maryam ne bacchey ki taraf ishara kardiya. Logon ne kaha “hum issey kya baat karein jo gehwarey (cradle) mein pada hua ek baccha hai?”
Baccha bol utha “ main Allah ka banda hoon usne mujhey kitab di , aur Nabi banaya
Aur babarakat kiya jahan bhi main rahoon, aur namaz aur zakaat ki pabandi ka hukum diya jab tak main zinda rahoon
Aur apni walida ka haqq ada karne wala banaya, aur mujhko jabbar (oppressive) aur shaqqi (hard-hearted) nahin banaya
Salam hai mujhpar jabke main paida hua aur jabke main maroon(die) aur jabke zinda karke uthaya jaoon”
Yeh hai Isa ibn Maryam aur yeh hai uske barey mein woh sacchi baat jismein log shakk kar rahey hain
Allah ka yeh kaam nahin hai ke woh kisi ko beta banaye. Woh paak zaat hai, woh jab kisi baat ka faisla karta hai to kehta hai ke hoja, aur bas woh ho jati hai
(Aur Isa ne kaha tha ke)”Allah mera Rubb bhi hai aur tumhara Rubb bhi, pas tum usi ki bandagi karo, yahi seedhi raah hai”
Magar phir mukhtalif giroh baham ikhtilaf karne lagey. So jin logon ne kufr kiya unke liye woh waqt badi tabahi ka hoga

Jabke woh ek bada din dekhenge, jab woh hamare saamne hazir hongey us roz to unke kaan bhi khoob sun rahey hongey aur unki aankhein bhi khoob dekhti hongi, magar aaj yeh zalim khuli gumraahi mein mubtila hain
(Aey Muhammad), is halat mein jabke yeh log gafil hain aur iman nahin la rahey hain, inhein us din se dara do jabke faisla kardiya jayega aur pachtawe ke siwa koi chara-e-kaar na hoga
Aakhir-e-kaar hum hi zameen aur uski sari cheezon ke waris hongey aur sab hamari taraf hi paltaye jayenge
Aur is kitaab mein Ibrahim ka qissa bayan karo, beshak woh ek raast-baaz Insaan aur ek Nabi tha
(Inhein zara us mauqe ki yaad dilao) jabke usne apne baap se kaha ke “Abbajaan, aap kyun un cheezon ki ibadat karte hain jo na sunti hain na dekhti hain aur na aap ka koi kaam bana sakti hain
Abbajaan, mere paas ek aisa ilam aaya hai jo aapke paas nahin aaya, aap mere peechey chalein , main aapko seedha raasta bataunga
Abbajaan!aap shaytan ki bandagi na karein, shaytan to rehman ka nafarman hai
Abbajaan, mujhey darr hai ke kahin aap rehman ke azaab mein mubtila na ho jayein aur shaytan ke saathi ban kar rahein”
Baap ne kaha “Ibrahim, kya tu mere maboodon se phir gaya hai? Agar tu baaz na aaya to main tujhey sangsar(stone you to death) kardunga. Bas tu hamesha ke liye mujhse alag ho jaa”
Ibrahim ne kaha “Salaam hai aapko, main apne Rubb se dua karoonga ke aapko maaf karde. Mera Rubb mujhpar bada hi meharban hai

Main aap logon ko bhi chodhta hoon aur un hastiyon ko bhi jinhein aap log khuda ko chodh kar pukara karte hain. Main to apne Rubb hi ko pukarunga , umeed hai ke main apne Rubb ko pukar ke na-murad na rahunga”
Pas jab woh un logon se aur unke maboodane gair Allah se juda ho gaya to humne usko Ishaaq aur Yakub jaisi aulad di aur har ek ko Nabi banaya
Aur unko apni rehmat se nawaza aur unko sacchi naamwari ata ki
Aur zikr karo is kitaab mein Moosa ka, woh ek cheeda (chosen) shaks tha aur Rasool Nabi tha
Humne usko Tur ke dahini(right) janib se pukara aur raaz ki guftagu se usko takarrub (honour) ata kiya
Aur apni mehrabani se uske bhai Haroon ko Nabi bana kar usey (madadgaar ke taur par) diya
Aur is kitaab mein Ismail ka zir karo, woh wadey ka saccha tha aur Rasool Nabi tha
Woh apne ghar walon ko namaz aur zakat ka hukum deta tha aur apne Rubb ke nazdeek ek pasandeeda Insaan tha
Aur is kitaab mein Idris ka zikr karo, woh ek raast-baaz (righteous) Insaan aur ek Nabi tha
Aur usey humne buland muqaam par uthaya tha

Yeh woh paigambar hain jinpar Allah ne inaam farmaya Adam ki aulad mein se, aur un logon ki nasal se jinhein humne Nooh ke saath kashti par sawaar kiya tha, aur Ibrahim ki nasal se aur Israel ki nasal se aur yeh un logon mein se thay jinko humne hidayat bakshi aur barguzida kiya.Inka haal yeh tha ke jab rehman ki aayat unko sunayi jati to rotey huey sajde mein gir jatey thay
Phir inke baad woh nakhalf (degenerate) log inke jaansaheen (sucessors) huey jinhon ne namaz ko zaya kiya aur khwahishat e nafs ki pairwi ki. Pas qareeb hai ke woh gumraahi ke anjaam se do-char hon
Albatta jo tawba karlein aur iman le aayein aur neik amali ikhtiyar karlein woh jannat mein dakhil hongey aur unki zarra barabar haqq talafi na hogi
Inke liye hamesha rehne wali jannatein hain jinka rehman ne apne bandon se dar-purda wada kar rakkha hai aur yaqeenan yeh wada poora hokar rehna hai
Wahan woh koi behuda baat na sunenge , jo kuch bhi sunenge theek hi sunenge aur unka rizq unhein paiham subh-o-shaam milta rahega
Yeh hai woh jannat jiska waris hum apne bandon mein se usko banayenge jo parheizgaar raha hai

(Aey Muhammad), hum tumhare Rubb ke hukum ke bagair nahin utra karte, jo kuch hamare aage hai aur jo kuch peechey hai aur jo kuch iske darmiyan mein hai har cheez ka maalik wahi hai aur tumhara Rubb bhoolne wala nahin hai

Woh Rubb hai aasmano ka aur zameen ka aur un saari cheezon ka jo aasman o zameen ke darmiyan hain, pas tum uski bandagi karo aur usi ki bangadi par sabit qadam raho. Kya hai koi hasti tumhare ilm mein iski hum paya (equal in rank to him)
Insaan kehta hai kya waqai jab main mar chukunga to phir zinda karke nikal laya jaunga
Kya Insaan ko yaad nahin aata ke hum pehle usko paida kar chuke hain jabke woh kuch bhi na tha
Tere Rubb ki kasam , hum zaroor un sab ko aur unke saath shayateen ko bhi gher layenge, phir jahannum ke gird laa kar inhein ghutno (knees) ke bal gira denge
Phir har giroh mein se har us shaks ko chaant lenge (pick out) jo rehman ke muqable mein zyada sarkash bana hua tha
Phir hum yeh jaante hain ke in mein se kaun sabse badhkar jahannum mein jhonke janey ka mustahiq hai
Tum mein se koi nahin hai jo jahannum par warid na ho,yeh to ek tai shuda baat hai jisey pura karna tere Rubb ka zimma hai
Phir hum un logon ko bacha lenge jo (duniya mein ) muttaqi thay aur zalimon ko usi mein gira hua chodh denge

In logon ko jab hamari khuli khuli aayat sunayi jati hain to inkar karne waley iman laney walon se kehte hain “batao, hum dono girohon mein se kaun behtar halat mein hai aur kiski majlisein zyada shandaar hai?”
Halanke insey pehle hum kitni hi aisi qaumo ko halaak kar chuke hain jo insey zyada sar-o-samaan rakhti thin aur zahiri shaan o shaukat mein insey badi hui thi

Insey kaho, jo shaks gumraahi mein mubtila hota hai usey Rehman dheel diya karta hai, yahan tak ke jab aisey log woh cheez dekh letay hain jiska unse wada kiya gaya hai khwa woh azaab e ilahi ho ya qayamat ki ghadi tab unhein maloom ho jata hai ke kiska haal kharab hai aur kiska jattha (party) kamzor

Iske baraks jo logo raah e raast ikhtiyar karte hain Allah unko raast-rawi mein taraqqi ata farmata hai aur baaqi reh janey wali nekiyan hi tere Rubb ke nazdeek jaza aur anjaam ke aitbaar se behtar hain
Phir tu nay dekha us shaks ko jo hamari aayat ko manney se inkar karta hai aur kehta hai ke main to maal aur aulad se nawaza hi jata rahunga
Kya usey gaib ka pata chal gaya hai ya usne rehman se koi ahad le rakkha hai
Hargiz nahin, jo kuch yeh bakhta (boasts of) hai isey hum likh lengey aur iske liye saza mein aur zyada izafa karenge
Jis sar-o-samaan aur laao lashkar ka yeh zikr kar raha hai woh sab hamare paas reh jayega aur yeh akela hamare saamne hazir hoga
In logon ne Allah ko chodh kar apne kuch khuda bana rakkhey hain taa-ke woh inke pushtebaan (supporters) hon
Koi pushtebaan na hoga, woh sab inki ibadat ka inkar karenge aur ultey inke mukhalif ban jayenge
Kya tum dekhte nahin ho ke humne in munkireen e haqq par shayateen chodh rakkhey hain jo inhein khoob khoob (mukhalifat e haqq par) uksa rahey hain
Accha, to ab inpar nuzul e azaab ke liye betaab na ho, hum inke din gin rahey hain
Woh din aane wala hai jab muttaqi logon ko hum mehmaano ki tarah rehman ke huzur pesh karenge
Aur mujreemon ko pyase jaanwaron ki tarah jahannum ki taraf haank le jayenge
Us waqt log koi sifarish laney par qaadir na honge bajuz uske jisne Rehman ke huzur se parwana hasil karliya ho
Woh kehte hain ke rehman ne kisi ko beta bana liya hai
Sakht behuda baat hai jo tum log ghadh laye ho
Qareeb hai ke aasmaan phatt padein, zameen shaqq ho jaye (split asunder) aur pahad gir jayein
Is baat par ke logon ne Rehman ke liye aulad honay ka dawa kiya
Rehman ki yeh shaan nahin hai ke woh kisi ko beta banaye
Zameen aur aasmaano ke andar jo bhi hain sab uske huzoor bandon ki haisiyat se pesh honay waley hain
Sab par woh muheet (encircled) hai aur usne unko shumaar kar rakkha hai
Sab qayamat ke roz fardan fardan (akele akele) uske saamne hazir hongey
Yaqeenan jo log iman le aaye hain aur amal e saleh kar rahey hain anqareeb Rehman unke liye dilon mein muhabbat paida kardega
Pas (aey Muhammad) , is kalam ko humne aasaan karke tumhari zubaan mein isi liye nazil kiya hai ke tum parheizgaron ko khush khabri dedo aur hat-dharm (jhagdalu/obdurate) logon ko dara do
Insey pehle hum kitni hi qaumon ko halaak kar chuke hain, phir aaj kahin tum unka nishaan patey ho, ya unki bhanak bhi kahin sunayi deti hai
Ta ha
Humne yeh Quran tumpar is liye nazil nahin kiya hai ke tum museebat mein padh jao
Yeh to ek yaad dihani hai har us shaks ke liye jo darey
Nazil kiya gaya hai us zaat ki taraf se jisne paida kiya hai zameen ko aur buland aasmano ko
Woh Rehman (qayanaat ke) takht e sultanat par jalwa farma hai
Maalik hai un sab cheezon ka jo aasmano aur zameen mein hain aur jo zameen o aasmaan ke darmiyan mein hain aur jo mitti ke nichey hain
Tum chahe apni baat pukar kar kaho, woh to chupke se kahi hui baat balke issey makhfi-tar (most secret) baat bhi jaanta hai
Woh Allah hai, uske siwa koi khuda nahin, uske liye behtareen naam hain
Aur tumhein kuch Moosa ki khabar bhi pahunchi hai

Jabke usne ek aag dekhi aur apne ghar walon se kaha ke “ zara thehro, maine ek aag dekhi hai, shayad ke tumhare liye ek-aad angara le aaon, ya is aag par mujhey (raaste ke mutaalik) koi rehnumayi (guidance) mil jaye”
Wahan pahuncha to pukara gaya “Aey Moosa
Main hi tera Rubb hoon, jutiyan (shoes) utaar de, tu waadi e muqaddas Tuwa mein hai
Aur maine tujhko chun liya hai, sun jo kuch wahee kiya jata hai
Main hi Allah hoon, mere siwa koi khuda nahin hai, pas tu meri bandagi kar aur meri yaad ke liye namaz qayam kar
Qayamat ki ghadi zaroor aane wali hai, main uska waqt makhfi rakhna chahta hoon, taa-ke har mutanaffis apni saii(labours/koshish) ke mutabik badla paye
Pas koi aisa shaks jo uspar iman nahin laata aur apni khwahish e nafs ka banda ban gaya hai tujhko us ghadi ki fikr se na roak de, warna tu halakat mein padh jayega
Aur aey Moosa, yeh tere haath mein kya hai?”
Moosa ne jawab diya “yeh meri laathi hai, ispar taik laga kar chalta hoon, issey apni bakriyon ke liye pattey jhadta hoon, aur bhi bahut se kaam hain jo issey leta hoon”
Farmaya “phenk de isko Moosa”
Usne phenk diya aur yakayak woh ek saanp (snake) thi jo daud raha tha
Farmaya “pakad le isko aur darr nahin, hum isey phir waisa hi kardenge jaisi yeh thi
Aur zara apna haath apni bagal mein daba, chamakta hua niklega bagair kisi takleef ke, yeh dusri nishani hai
Is liye ke hum tujhey apni badi nishniyan dikane waley hain
Ab tu Firoun ke paas jaa, woh sarkash ho gaya hai”
Moosa ne arz kiya “ parwardigar, mera seena khol de
Aur mere kaam ko mere liye aasaan karde
Aur meri zubaan ki girah suljha de
Taa-ke log meri baat samajh sakein
Aur mere liye mere apne kumbe (my own family) se ek wazir muqarrar karde
Haroon, jo mera bhai hai
Uske zariye se mera haath mazboot kar
Aur usko mere kaam mein shareek karde
Hum khoob teri paaki bayan karein
Aur khoob tera charcha karein
Tu hamesha hamare haal par nigraan raha hai”
Farmaya “ diya gaya jo tu nay maanga aey Moosa
Humne phir ek martaba tujhpar ehsan kiya
Yaad karo woh waqt jabke humne teri Maa ko ishara kiya, aisa ishara jo wahee ke zariye kiya jaata hai

Ke is bacchey ko sandook (box) mein rakh de aur sandook ko dariya mein chodh de, dariya isey saahil par phenk dega aur isey mera dushman aur is bacchey ka dushman utha lega. Maine apni taraf se tujhpar mohabbat taari kardi aur aisa intizam kiya ke tu meri nigrani mein paala jaye

Yaad kar jabke teri behan chal rahi thi, phir jaa kar kehti hai, “main tumhein uska pata doon jo is bacchey ki parwarish acchi tarah karey?” Is tarah humne tujhey phir teri Maa ke paas pahuncha diya taa-ke uski aankh thandi rahey aur woh ranjeeda na ho. Aur (yeh bhi yaad kar ke) tu nay ek shaks ko qatal kardiya tha, humne tujhey is phanday se nikala aur tujhey mukhtalif aazmaaishon se guzara aur tu Madiyan ke logon mein kai saal thehra raha. Phir ab theek apne waqt par tu aa gaya hai aey Moosa
Maine tujhey apne kaam ka bana liya hai
Ja, tu aur tera bhai meri nishaniyon ke saath, aur dekho tum meri yaad mein taqseer (susti /negligence) na karna
Jao tum dono Firoun ke paas ke woh sarkash ho gaya hai
Ussey narmi ke saath baat karna, shayad ke woh naseehat qabool karey ya darr jaaye”
Dono ne arz kiya “ parwardigar, humein andesha hai ke woh humpar zyadati karega ya pil padega(treat us cruelly)”
Farmaya” daro mat, main tumhare saath hoon, sab kuch sun raha hoon aur dekh raha hoon

Jao uske paas aur kaho ke hum tere Rubb ke faristaade (messengers) hain, bani Israel ko hamare saath janey ke liye chodh de aur unko takleef na de. Hum tere paas tere Rubb ki nishani lekar aaye hain aur salamati hai uske liye jo raah-e-raast ki pairwi karey
Humko wahee (revelation) se bataya gaya hai ke azaab hai uske liye jo jhutlaye aur mooh moadey.”
Firoun ne kaha “accha, to phir tum dono ka Rubb kaun hai aey Moosa?”
Moosa ne jawab diya “hamara Rubb woh hai jisne har cheez ko uski saakht bakshi(given distinctive form), phir usko raasta bataya”
Firoun bola “aur pehle jo nasalein (generations) guzar chuki hain unki phir kya halat thi?”
Moosa ne kaha “uska ilam mere Rubb ke paas ek nawishte (record) mein mehfooz hai, mera Rub na chukta hai na bhoolta hai”
Wahi jisne tumhare liye zameen ka farsh bichaya, aur usmein tumhare chalne ko raaste banaye, aur upar se pani barsaya, phir uske zariye se mukhtalif aqsam ki paidawaar nikali
Khao aur apne jaanwaron ko bhi charao, yaqeenan is mein bahut si nishaniyan hain aqal rakhne walon ke liye
Isi zameen se humne tumko paida kiya hai, isi mein hum tumhein wapas le jayenge aur isi se tumko dobara nikalenge
Humne Firoun ko apni sabhi nishaniyan dikayi magar woh jhutlaye chala gaya aur na maana
Kehne laga “aey Moosa, kya tu hamare paas is liye aaya hai ke apne jaadu ke zoar se humko hamare mulk se nikal bahar karey
Accha, hum bhi tere muqable mein waisa hi jaadu latey hain, tai karle kab aur kahan muqaabla karna hai, na hum is qarardaad se phirenge na tu Phiriyo , khule maidan mein saamne aaja”
Moosa ne kaha “jashn ka din tai hua, aur din chadhey log jama hon”
Firoun ne palat kar apne saare hathkande jama kiye aur muqaable mein aa gaya

Moosa ne ( ain mauqe par giroh muqabil ko mukhatib karke) kaha “shamat ke maaron, na jhooti tohmatein (invent falsehood) baandho Allah par, warna woh ek sakht azaab se tumhara sattyanaas kardega, jhoot jisne bhi ghada woh na-murad hua”
Yeh sunkar unke darmiyan ikhtilaf e raai ho gaya aur woh chupke chupke baham mashwarey karne lagey

Aakhir-e-kaar kuch logon ne kaha ke “yeh dono to mehaz jaadugar hain.Inka maqsad yeh hai ke apne jaadu ke zoar se tumko tumhari zameen se be-dakhal kardein aur tumhare misaali (ideal) tareeq-e-zindagi ka khatma kardein
Apni saari tadberein aaj ikatthi karlo aur eka karke maidan mein aao. Bas yeh samajhlo ke aaj jo gaalib raha wahi jeet gaya.”
Jaadugar bole “Moosa, tum phenkte ho ya pehle hum phenkein?”
Moosa ne kaha “nahin, tumhi phenko” yakayak unki rassiyan aur unki laathiyan unke jaadu ke zoar se Moosa ko daudti hui mehsoos hone lagi
Aur moosa apne dil mein darr gaya
Humne kaha “mat darr, tu hi galib rahega

Phenk jo kuch tere haath mein hai, abhi inki saari banawati cheezon ko ningle (swallow) jata hai, yeh jo kuch bana kar laye hain yeh to jaadugar ka fareb hai, aur jaadugar kabhi kamiyab nahin ho sakta, khwah kisi shaan se woh aaye”
Aakhir ko yahi hua ke saarey jaadugar sajde mein gira diye gaye aur pukar utthey “ maan liya humne Haroon aur Moosa ke Rubb ko”

Firoun ne kaha “tum iman le aaye qabl iske ke main tumhein iski ijazat deta? Maloom ho gaya ke yeh tumhara guru hai jisne tumhein jaadugari sikhayi thi. Accha ab main tumhare haath paon mukhalif simton (alternate sides ) se katwata hoon aur khajoor ke tano(trunks) par tumko sooli deta hoon, phir tumhein pata chal jayega ke hum dono mein se kiska azaab zyada sakht aur dair pa hai” (yani main tumhein zyada sakht saza de sakta hoon ya Moosa)

Jaadugaron (magicians) ne jawab diya “qasam hai us zaat ki jisne humein paida kiya hai, yeh hargiz nahin ho sakta ke hum roshan nishaniyan samne aa janey ke baad bhi (sadaqat par) tujhey tarjeeh dein. Tu jo kuch karna chahey karle, tu zyada se zyada bas isi duniya ki zindagi ka faisla kar sakta hai

Hum to apne Rubb par iman le aaye taa-ke woh hamari khatayein maaf karde, aur is jaadugari se jispar tu nay humein majboor kiya tha darguzar farmaye. Allah hi accha hai aur wahi baaqi rehne waala hai”
Haqeeqat yeh hai ke jo mujrin bankar apne Rubb ke huzoor haazir hoga uske liye jahannum hai jismein woh na jiyega na marega
Aur jo uske huzoor momin ki haisiyat se haazir hoga, jisne neik amal kiye hongey, aisey sab logon ke liye buland darje hain
Sada bahaar baagh (gardens) hain jinke nichey nehrein beh rahi hongi Un mein woh hamesha rahenge.yeh jaza hai us shaks ki jo pakeezgi ikhtiyar karey

Humne Moosa par wahee ki ke ab raat-o-raat mere bandon ko lekar chal padh, aur unke liye samandar mein sukhi sadak (dry path) bana le, tujhe kisi ke taaqub ka zara khauf na ho aur na (samandar ke beech se guzarte huey) darr lagey
Peechey se Frioun apne laskhar lekar pahucha aur phir samandar unpar chaa gaya jaisa ke chaa jaane ka haqq tha
Firoun ne apni qaum ko gumraah hi kiya tha, koi saheeh rehnumayi nahin ki thi
Aey bani Israel, humne tumko tumhare dushman se najaat di, aur Tur ke dayein jaanib tumhari haazri ke liye waqt muqarrar kiya aur tumpar manna o salwa (quails) utara
Khao hamara diya hua paak rizq aur isey kha kar sarkashi na karo warna tumpar mera gazab toot padega. Aur jispar mera gazab toota woh phir gir kar hi raha
Albatta jo tawba karle aur iman laye aur neik amal karey, phir seedha chalta rahey, uske liye main bahut darguzar karne wala hoon
Aur kya cheez tumhein apni qaum se pehle le aayi Moosa
Usne arz kiya “woh bas mere peechey aa hi rahey hain. Main jaldi karke tere huzoor aa gaya hoon aey mere Rubb, taa-ke tu mujhse khush ho jaye”
Farmaya “accha, to suno, humne tumhare peechey tumhari qaum ko aazmaish mein daal diya aur Saamri ne unhein gumraah kar dala”

Moosa sakht gussey aur ranjj ki halat mein apni qaum ki taraf palta. Jaakar usne kaha “aey meri qaum ke logon, kya tumhare Rubb ne tumse acchey wadey nahin kiye thay? Kya tumhein din lag gaye hain? Ya tum apne Rubb ka gazab hi apne upar lana chahte thay ke tumne mujhse wada khilafi ki?”

Unhon ne jawab diya “humne aap se wada khilafi kuch apne ikhtiyar se nahin ki. Maamla yeh hua ke logon ke zewarat ke bojh se hum ladh gaye thay aur humne bas unko phenk diya tha” phir isi tarah Saamri ne bhi kuch dala
Aur unke liye ek bachde (shape of a calf) ki murat banakar nikal laya jissey bail (ox) ki si aawaz nikalti thi. Log pukar utthey “yahi hai tumhara khuda aur Moosa ka khuda, Moosa isey bhool gaya”
Kya woh dekhte na thay ke na woh unki baat ka jawab deta hai aur na unke nafa o nuksan ka kuch ikhtiyar rakhta hai
Haroon (Moosa ke aane se ) pehle hi unse keh chuka tha ke “Logon, tum iski wajah se fitne (trial) mein padh gaye ho, tumhara Rubb to Rehman hai, pas tum meri pairwi karo aur meri baat maano.”
Unhon ne ussey kehdiya ke “hum isi ki parastish karte rahenge jab tak ke Moosa wapas na aa jaaye”
Moosa (qaum ko daatne ke baad Haroon ki taraf palta aur ) bola “ Haroon, tumne jab dekha tha ke yeh gumraah ho rahey hain
To kis cheez ne tumhara haath pakda tha ke mere tareeqe par amal na karo? Kya tumne mere hukum ki khilaf-warzi ki

Haroon ne jawab diya “ aey meri Maa ke bete , meri daadi (beard) na pakad, na mere sar ke baal khench, mujhey is baat ka darr tha ke tu aa kar kahega tumne bani Israel mein phoot daal di aur meri baat ka paas na kiya”
Moosa ne kaha “Aur Saamri, tera kya maamla hai?”
Usne jawab diya “ maine woh cheez dekhi jo in logon ko nazar na aayi, pas maine Rasool ke nakshe qadam se ek mutthi utha li aur usko daal diya, mere nafs ne mujhey kuch aisa hi sujhaya”

Moosa ne kaha, “accha to jaa, ab zindagi bhar tujhey yahi pukarte rehna hai ke mujhey na choona aur tere liye baaz-purs ka ek waqt muqarrar hai jo tujhse hargiz na taleyga aur dekh apne is khuda ko jispar tu richa (cherished so much) hua tha, ab hum usey jala daalenge aur reza reza karke dariya mein baha denge
Logon, tumhara khuda to bas ek hi Allah hai jiske siwa koi aur khuda nahin hai, har cheez par uska ilm haawi hai”
(Aey Muhammad), is tarah hum pichle guzre huey haalaat ki khabrein tumko sunate hain, aur humne khaas apne haan se tumko ek “zikr” (dars e naseehat) ata kiya hai
Jo koi issey moah moadega woh qayamat ke din sakht baar e gunaah uthayega
Aur aise sab log hamesha iske wabal mein giraftar rahenge, aur qayamat ke din unke liye (is jurm ki zimmedari ka bojh) bada takleef-de bojh hoga
Us din jabke soor (trumphet) phoonka jayega aur hum mujrimo ko is haal mein gher layenge ke unki aankhein (dehshat ke marey) pathrayi hui hongi
Aapas mein chupke chupke kahenge ke duniya mein mushkil hi se tumne koi dus(ten) din guzare honge

Humein khoob maloom hai ke woh kya baatein kar rahey hongey, (hum yeh bhi jaante hain ke) us waqt unmein se jo zyada se zyada mohtaat andaza lagane wala hoga woh kahega ke nahin, tumhari duniya ki zindagi bas ek din ki zindagi thi
Yeh log tumse poochte hain ke aakhir us din yeh pahad kahan chale jayenge? Kaho ke mera Rubb unko dhool banakar uda dega
Aur zameen ko aisa humwar chatiyal maidan bana dega (empty level plain)
Ke ismein tum koi bal aur salwat (neither curve nor crease) na dekhoge
Us roz sab log munadi (summoner /pukarne waley) ki pukar par seedhey chaley aayenge, koi zara akad na dikha sakega aur aawazein rehman ke aagey dub jayengi , ek sar-sarahat ke siwa tum kuch na sunoge
Us roz shafaat (intercession) kaargar na hogi, illa yeh ke kisi ko rehman iski ijazat de aur uski baat sunna pasand karey
Woh logon ka agla pichla sub haal jaanta hai aur dusron ko iska poora ilm nahin hai
Logon ke sar us hayyul qayyum (zinda aur qayam) ke aagey jhuk jayenge. Na-murad hoga jo us waqt kisi zulm ka baar (bojh)-e-gunaah uthaye huey ho
Aur kisi zulm ya haqq talafi ka khatra na hoga us shaks ko jo neik amal karey aur iske saath woh momin bhi ho

Aur (aey Muhammad) isi tarah humne isey Quran e arabi bana kar nazil kiya hai aur ismein tarah tarah se tambihaat (warnings) ki hain shayad ke yeh log kajhrawi (perverseness) se bachein ya in mein kuch hosh ke aasaar is ki badaulat paida hon

Pas baala o bartar hai Allah, baadshah e haqiqi. Aur dekho, Quran padhne mein jaldi na kiya karo jabtak ke tumhari taraf uski wahee takmeel ko na pahunch jaye, aur dua karo ke aey parwardigar mujhey mazeed ilm ata kar
Humne issey pehle Adam ko ek hukum diya tha, magar woh bhool gaya aur humne us mein azm (determination/firm resolve) na paya
Yaad karo woh waqt jabke humne Farishton se kaha tha ke Adam ko sajda karo, woh sab to sajda kar gaye, magar ek iblis tha ke inkar kar baitha
Ispar humne Adam se kaha ke “dekho, yeh tumhara aur tumhari biwi ka dushman hai, aisa na ho ke yeh tumhein jannat se nikalwa de aur tum museebat mein padh jao
Yahan to tumhein yeh aasaishein (facilities) hasil hain ke na bhuke nange rehte ho
Na pyas aur dhoop tumhein satati hai”
Lekin shaytan ne usko phuslaya, kehne laga “Adam, bataun tumhein woh darakht jissey abadi zindagi aur la-zawal (everlasting) sultanat hasil hoti hai?”

Aakhir e kaar woh dono (miyan biwi) us darakht ka phal kha gaye, natija ye hua ke fawran hi unke satr (nakedness) ek dusre ke aagey khul gaye aur lagey dono apne aap ko jannat ke patton se dhankne. Adam ne apne Rubb ki nafarmani ki aur raah-e-raast se bhatak gaya
Phir uske Rubb ne usey barguzida kiya aur uski tawba qabool karli aur usey hidayat bakshi

Aur farmaya “tum dono (fareeq, yaani Insaan aur shaytan) yahan se utar jao, tum ek dusre ke dushman rahogey. Ab agar meri taraf se tumhein koi hidayat pahunche to jo koi meri us hidayat ki pairwi karega woh na bhatkega na badbakhti mein mubtala hoga
Aur jo mere “zikr” (dars e naseehat) se mooh moadega uske liye duniya mein tangg zindagi hogi aur qayamat ke roz hum usey andha utayenge”
Woh kahega “parwardigar, duniya mein to main ankhon wala tha, yahan mujhey andha kyun uthaya?”
Allah taala farmayega “haan, isi tarah tu hamari aayat ko, jabke woh tere paas aayi thi, tu nay bhula diya tha usi tarah aaj tu bhulaya jaa raha hai”
Is tarah hum hadd se guzarne waley aur apne Rubb ki aayat na maanne waley ko (duniya mein ) badla dete hain aur aakhirat ka azaab zyada sakht aur zyada dair pa hai (more lasting)

Phir kya in logon ko (tareekh ke is sabaq se) koi hidayat na mili ke insey pehle kitni hi qaumon ko hum halaak kar chuke hain jinki (barbaad shuda) bastiyon mein aaj yeh chalte phirte hain? Dar haqeeqat ismein bahut si nishaniyan hain un logon ke liye jo aqal e saleem rakhne walay hain
Agar tere Rubb ki taraf se pehle ek baat tai na kardi gayi hoti aur mohlat ki ek muddat muqarrar na ki jaa chuki hoti to zaroor inka bhi faisla chuka diya jata

Pas (aey Muhammad), jo baatein yeh log banate hain unpar sabr karo, aur apne Rubb ki hamd o sana ke saath uski tasbeeh karo Suraj nikalne se pehle aur guroob honay se pehle, aur raat ke auqat mein bhi tasbeeh karo aur din ke kinaron par bhi, shayad ke tum raazi ho jao

Aur nigah utha kar bhi na dekho duniyavi zindagi ki us shaan o shaukat ko jo humne in mein se mukhtalif kism ke logon ko de rakkhi hai, woh to humne unhein aazmaish mein daalne ke liye di hai, aur tere Rubb ka diya hua rizq e halal hi behtar aur paaindatar (more lasting) hai

Apne ehal o ayal (member of your family) ko namaz ki talkeen karo aur khud bhi iske paband raho, hum tumse koi rizq nahin chahte, rizq to hum hi tumhein de rahey hain aur anjaam ki bhalayi taqwa hi ke liye hai
Woh kehte hain ke yeh shaks apne Rubb ki taraf se koi nishani (mojaza) kyun nahin laata? Aur kya inke paas agle saheefon ki tamaam taleemat ka bayan e wazeh nahin aa gaya

Agar hum uske aane se pehle inko kisi azaab se halaak kardete to phir yahi log kehte ke aey hamare parwardigar, tu nay hamare paas koi Rasool kyun na bheja ke zaleel o ruswa honay se pehle hi hum teri aayat ki pairwi ikhtiyar kar letay

(Aey Muhammad) insey kaho, har ek anjaam e kaar ke intezar mein hai, pas ab muntazir raho, anqareeb tumhein maloom ho jayega ke kaun seedhi raah chalne waley hain aur kaun hidayat-yafta (rightly guided) hain
Qareeb aa gaya hai logon ke hisaab ka waqt, aur woh hain ke gaflat mein mooh moadey huey hain
Unke paas jo taaza naseehat bhi unke Rubb ki taraf se aati hai usko be-takalluf sunte hain aur khel mein padey rehte hain

Dil unke (dusri hi fikron mein) munhamik hain aur zalim aapas mein sargoshiyan(whisper) karte hain ke “yeh shaks aakhir tum jaisa ek bashar (Insaan) hi to hai, phir kya tum aankhon dekhte jaadu ke phanday mein phas jaogey?”
Rasool ne kaha, mera Rubb har us baat ko jaanta hai jo aasman aur zameen mein ki jaye, woh sami(sunne wala) aur aleem (jaanne wala) hai

Woh kehte hain “balke yeh paraganda (incoherent) khwab hai , balke yeh iski mann-ghadath hai, balke yeh shaks shayar hai warna yeh laye koi nishani jis tarah purane zamane ke Rasool nishaniyon ke saath bheje gaye thay”
Halaanke inse pehle koi basti bhi, jisey humne halaak kiya, iman na layi, ab kya yeh iman layenge
Aur (aey Muhammad), tumse pehle bhi humne Insaano hi ko Rasool bana kar bheja tha jinpar hum wahee (revelation) kiya karte thay, Tum log agar ilm nahin rakhte to ehle kitaab se pooch lo
Un Rasoolon ko humne koi aisa jism nahin diya tha ke woh khate na hon, aur na woh sadaa (hamesha) jeenay waley thay
Phir dekhlo ke aakhir e kaar humne unke saath apne wadey poorey kiye, aur unhein aur jis jis ko humne chaha bacha liya, aur hadd se guzar janey walon ko halaak kardiya
Logon, humne tumhari taraf ek aisi kitaab bheji hai jismein tumhara hi zikr hai, kya tum samajhte nahin ho
Kitni hi zalim bastiyan hain jinko humne pees kar rakh diya aur unke baad dusri kisi qaum ko uthaya
Jab unko hamara azaab mehsoos hua to lagey wahan se bhaagne
(kaha gaya) “bhaago nahin, jao apne unhi gharon mein aur aesh ke samaano mein jinke andar tum chain kar rahey thay, shayad ke tumse poocha jaye”
Kehne lagey “haye hamari kambakhti, beshak hum khatawaar thay”
Aur woh yahi pukarte rahey yahan tak ke humne unko khalyan (threshed/field that is reaped) kardiya , zindagi ka ek sharara tak unmein na raha (leaving no spark of life in them)
Humne is aasman aur zameen ko aur jo kuch bhi inmein hai kuch khel ke taur par nahin banaya hai
Agar hum koi khilona banan chahte aur bas yahi kuch humein karna hota to apne hi paas se kar letey
Magar hum to baatil par haqq ki chot lagate hain jo uska sar todh deti hai aur woh dekhte dekhte mitt jata hai, aur tumhare liye tabahi hai un baaton ki wajah se jo tum banate ho
Zameen aur aasmano mein jo makhlooq bhi hai Allah ki hai aur jo (Farishtey) uske paas hain woh na apne aap ko bada samajh kar uski bandagi se sartabi karte hain aur na malool (weary /tire) hotey hain
Shab-o-roz uski tasbeeh karte rehte hain, dum nahin letey
Kya in logon ke banaye huey arzi khuda aisey hain ke (be-jaan ko jaan baksh kar) utha khada karte hon
Agar aasman o zameen mein ek Allah ke siwa dusre khuda bhi hotey to (zameen aur aasman) dono ka nizam bigad jata. Pas paak hai Allah Rabbul arsh un baaton se jo yeh log bana rahey hain
Woh apne kaamon ke liye (kisi ke aagey) jawab-de nahin hai aur sab jawab-de hain

Kya usey chodh kar inhon ne dusre khuda bana liye hain? (Aey Muhammad) inse kaho ke “lao apni daleel,yeh kitaab bhi maujood hai jismein mere daur ke logon ke liye naseehat hai aur woh kitaabein bhi maujood hain jin mein mujhse pehle logon ke liye naseehat thi” magar un mein se aksar log haqeeqat se bekhabar hain, is liye mooh moadey huey hain
Humne tumse pehle jo Rasool bhi bheja hai usko yahi wahee ki hai ke mere siwa koi khuda nahin hai, pas tumlog meri hi bandagi karo
Yeh kehte hain “rehman aulad rakhta hai” SubhanAllah , woh to banday hain jinhein izzat di gayi hai
Uske huzoor badh kar nahin bolte aur bas uske hukum par amal karte hain

Jo kuch unke saamne hai usey bhi woh jaanta hai aur jo kuch unse ojhal hai ussey bhi woh bakhabar hai, woh kisi ki sifarish nahin karte bajuz uske jiske haqq mein sifarish sunne par Allah raazi ho, aur woh uske khauf se darey rehte hain
Aur jo unmein se koi kehde ke Allah ke siwa main bhi ek khuda hoon, to usey hum jahannum ki saza dein, hamare haan zaalimon ka yahi badla hai

Kya yeh log jinhon ne (Nabi ki baat maanney se) inkar kardiya hai gaur nahin karte ke yeh sab aasman aur zameen baham miley huey thay, phir humne inhein juda kiya, aur pani se har zinda cheez paida ki, kya woh (hamari is khallaqi ko) nahin maante
Aur humne zameen mein pahad jamaa diye taa-ke woh unhein lekar dhulak na jaye, aur ismein kushada raahein bana di, shayad ke log apna raasta maloom karlein
Aur humne aasman ko ek mehfooz chatt bana diya, magar ye hain ke iski nishaniyon ki taraf tawajju hi nahin karte
Aur woh Allah hi hai jisne raat aur din banaye aur Suraj aur Chand ko paida kiya, sab ek ek falak mein tair rahey hain
Aur (aey Muhammad), hameshgi(eternity) to humne tumse pehle bhi kisi Insaan ke liye nahin rakkhi hai agar tum mar gaye to kya yeh log hamesha jeetay rahenge
Har jaandaar ko maut ka maza chakhna hai, aur hum acchey aur burey halaat mein daal kar tum sabki aazmaish kar rahey hain, aakhir-e-kaar tumhein hamari hi taraf palatna hai

Yeh munkireen e haqq jab tumhein dekhte hain to tumhara mazaaq bana letey hain. Kehte hain “kya yeh hai woh shaks jo tumhare khudaon ka zikr kiya karta hai?” aur inka apna haal yeh hai ke rehman ke zikr se munkir hain
Insaan jald baaz makhlooq hai, abhi main tumko apni nishaniyan dikhaye deta hoon, jaldi na machao
Yeh log kehte hain “aakhir yeh dhamki poori kab hogi agar tum sacchey ho”
Kaash in kaafiron ko us waqt ka kuch ilam hota jabke yeh na apne mooh aag se bacha sakenge na apni peethein, aur na inko kahin se madad pahunchegi
Woh balaa (catastrophe) achanak aayegi aur inhein is tarah yaklakht (suddenly) daboch legi ke yeh na usko dafaa kar sakenge aur na inko lamha bhar mohlat hi mil sakegi
Mazaaq tumse pehle bhi Rasoolon ka udaya jaa chuka hai, magar unka mazaaq udane waley usi cheez ke pher mein aa kar rahey jiska woh mazaaq udatey thay
(Aey Muhammad), insey kaho, “kaun hai jo raat ko ya din ko tumhein rehman se bacha sakta ho?” magar yeh apne Rubb ki naseehat se mooh moad rahey hain
Kya yeh kuch aise khuda rakhte hain jo hamare muqable mein inki himayat karein? Woh na to khud apni madad kar sakte hain aur na hamari hi taaeed unko haasil hai

Asal baat yeh hai ke in logon ko aur inke aabaa o ajdaad (fore-fathers) ko hum zindagi ka sar o saamaan diye chale gaye yahan tak ke inko din lag gaye (until the period grew too long for them). Magar kya inhein nazar nahin aata ke hum zameen ko mukhtalif simton se ghataye chale aa rahey hain (shrinking its boundaries)? Phir kya yeh gaalib aa jayenge
Inse kehdo ke “main to wahee (revelation) ki bina par tumhein mutanabbeh (warn) kar raha hoon”. Magar behre pukaar ko nahin suna karte jabke unhein khabardaar kiya jaye
Aur agar tere Rubb ka azaab zara sa inhein choo jaye to abhi cheekh utthein ke haaye hamari kambakhti, beshak hum khatawaar thay

Qayamat ke roz hum theek theek toalne waley tarazu rakh dengey, phir kisi shaks par zarra barabar zulm na hoga. Jiska rai (mustard seed) ke daane ke barabar bhi kuch kiya dhara hoga woh hum saamne le aayenge aur hisaab lagane ke liye hum kafi hain
Pehle hum Moosa aur Haroon ko furqan(criteria) aur roshni aur “zikr” ata kar chuke hain un muttaqi logon ki bhalayi ke liye
Jo bay-dekhe (bagair dekhe) apne Rubb se darein aur jinko (hisaab ki) us ghadi ka khatka laga hua hai
Aur ab yeh ba-barakat “zikr” humne (tumhare liye) nazil kiya hai phir kya tum isko qabool karne se inkaari ho
Ussey bhi pehle humne Ibrahim ko uski hosh-mandi bakshi thi aur hum usko khoob jantey thay
Yaad karo woh mauqa ke usne apne baap aur apni qaum se kaha tha ke “yeh muratein (images) kaisi hain jinke tumlog girwida (devoted) ho rahey ho?”
Unhon ne jawab diya “humne apne baap dada ko inki ibadat karte paya hai”
Usne kaha “tum bhi gumraah ho aur tumhare baap dada bhi sareeh gumaraahi mein paday huey thay?”
Unhon ne kaha “kya tu hamare samne apne asli khayalaat pesh kar raha hai ya mazaaq karta hai?”
Usne jawab diya “nahin, balke fil waqey tumhara Rubb wahi hai jo zameen aur aasmano ka Rubb aur unka paida karne wala hai, ispar main tumhare samne gawahi deta hoon
Aur khuda ki kasam main tumhari gair maujoodgi mein zaroor tumhare buthon (idols/murtiyon) ki khabar lunga”
Chunanchey usne unko tukde tukde kardiya aur sirf unke baday ko chodh diya taa-ke shayad woh iski taraf rujoo karein
Unhon ne aakar buthon[idols] ka yeh haal dekha to) kehne lagey “hamare khudaon ka yeh haal kisne kardiya? Bada hi koi zalim tha woh”
(baaz log) boley “ humne ek nawjawan ko inka zikr karte suna tha jiska naam Ibrahim hai”
Unhon ne kaha “ to pakad lao usey sabke samne taa-ke log dekh lein (uski kaisi khabar li jati hai)”
(Ibrahim ke aane par) unhon ne pucha “kyun Ibrahim, tu nay hamare khudaon ke saath yeh harakat ki hai
Usne jawab diya “balke yeh sab kuch inke is sardar ne kiya hai, inhi se pooch lo agar yeh bolte hon”
Yeh sunkar woh log apne zameer ki taraf palte aur (apne dilon mein) kehne lagey “waqayi tum khud hi zalim ho”
Magar phir unki math palat gayi(minds became perverse) aur boley “ tu jaanta hai ke yeh bolte nahin hain”
Ibrahim ne kaha “phir kya tum Allah ko chodh kar un cheezon ko poojh rahey ho jo na tumhein nafaa pahunchane par qadir hain na nuqsan
Tuff (Fie) hai tumpar aur tumhare in maboodon par jinki tum Allah ko chodh kar pooja kar rahey ho, kya tum kuch bhi aqal nahin rakhte?”
Unhon ne kaha “jala daalo isko aur himayat karo apne khudaon ki agar tumhein kuch karna hai”
Humne kaha “Aey aag, thandi ho jaa aur salamati ban jaa Ibrahim par”
Woh chahte thay ke Ibrahim ke saath burayi karein magar humne unko buri tarah nakaam kardiya
Aur hum usey aur Lut ko bacha kar us sar-zameen ki taraf nikal le gaye jismein humne duniya walon ke liye barkatein rakkhi hain
Aur humne usey Ishaq ata kiya aur Yakoob uspar mazeed, aur har ek ko saleh (righteous) banaya

Aur humne unko imam bana diya jo hamare hukum se rehnumayi karte thay aur humne unhein wahee (revelation) ke zariye neik kaamon ki aur namaz qayam karne ki aur zakat dene ki hidayat ki, aur woh hamare ibadat guzaar thay
Aur Lut ko humne hukum aur ilm baksha aur usey us basti se bacha kar nikal diya jo badkariyan karti thi. Dar haqeeqat woh badi hi buri, fasiq qaum thi
Aur Lut ko humne apni rehmat mein dakhil kiya, woh saleh logon mein se tha
Aur yahi niyamat humne Nooh ko di, yaad karo jabke in sab se pehle usne humein pukara tha, humne uski dua qabool ki aur usey aur uske ghar walon ko karb-e-azeem (great calamity) se najaat di
Aur us qaum ke muqaable mein uski madad ki jisne hamari aayat ko jhutla diya tha. Woh baday burey log thay, pas humne un sabko garq (drown) kardiya

Aur isi niyamat se humne Dawood aur Suleiman ko sarfaraz kiya. Yaad karo woh mauqa jabke woh dono ek khet (field) ke muqaddame mein faisla kar rahey thay jismein raat ke waqt dusre logon ki bakriyan(goats) phayl gayi thin (strayed at night),aur hum unki adalat khud dekh rahey thay

Us waqt humne sahih faisla Sulaiman ko samjha diya, halaanke hukum aur ilm humne dono hi ko ata kiya tha. Dawood ke saath humne pahadon aur parindon ko musakkhar kardiya tha jo tasbeeh karte thay, is fail (kaam) ke karne waley hum hi thay
Aur humne usko tumhare faiyde ke liye zira (coats of armor) banane ki sanat (craft) sikha di thi, taa-ke tumko ek dusre ki maar se bachaye, phir kya tum shukar guzar ho
Aur Sulaiman ke liye humne teiz hawa ko musakkhar kardiya tha jo uske hukum se us sar-zameen ki taraf chalti thi jismein humne barkatein rakkhi hain. Hum har cheez ka ilm rakhne waley thay
Aur shayateen mein se humne aisey bahutson (many) ko uska tabey bana diya tha jo uske liye ghotey (diving) lagate aur iske siwa dusre kaam karte thay, in sab ke nigraan hum hi thay

Aur yahi (hosh-mandi aur hukum o ilm ki niyamat) humne Ayub ko di thi. Yaad karo jabke usne apne Rubb ko pukara ke “mujhey bimaari lag gayi hai aur tu arham ur rahimeen (sab se badhkar reham karne wala) hai.”

Humne uski dua qabool ki aur jo takleef usey thi usko door kardiya, aur sirf uske ehl-o-ayal hi usko nahin diye balke unke saath utne hi aur bhi diye, apni khaas rehmat ke taur par, aur isliye ke yeh ek sabaq ho ibadat guzaaron keliye
Aur yahi niyamat Ismail aur Idris(Enoch) aur Dhul-Kifl (Isaiah) ko di, ke yeh sab saabir log (practised fortitude) thay
Aur unko humne apni rehmat mein dakhil kiya ke woh salihon (righteous people) mein se thay

Aur machli waley(yunus) ko bhi humne nawaza, yaad karo jabke woh bigad kar chala gaya tha aur samjha tha ke hum uspar giraft na karenge. Aakhir ko usne tareekiyon(darkness) mein pukara “nahin hai koi khuda magar tu, paak hai teri zaat, beshak maine kasoor kiya”
Tab humne uski dua qabool ki aur ghum se usko najaat bakshi, aur isi taraah hum momino ko bacha liya karte hain
Aur zakariya ko, jabke usne apne Rubb ko pukara ke “aey parwardigar, mujhey akela na chodh, aur behtareen waris to tu hi hai”

Pas humne uski dua qabool ki aur usey Yahya ata kiya aur uski biwi ko uske liye durust kardiya, yeh log neki ke kaamon mein daud-dhoop karte thay aur humein ragbat (with love) aur khauf ke saath pukarte thay, aur hamare aagey jhuke huey thay
Aur woh khaatun jisne apni ismat (chastity) ki hifazat ki thi, humne uske andar apni rooh se phoonka aur usey aur uske bete ko duniya bhar ke liye nishani bana diya
Yeh tumhari ummat haqeeqat mein ek hi ummat hai aur main tumhara Rubb hoon, pas tum meri ibadat karo
Magar (yeh logon ki karastani hai ke) inhon ne aapas mein deen ko tukde tukde kar dala, sabko hamari taraf palatna hai
Phir jo neik amal karega, is haal mein ke woh momin ho, to uske kaam ki na-qadri na hogi, aur usey hum likh rahey hain
Aur mumkin nahin hai ke jis basti ko humne halaak kardiya ho woh phir palat sakey
Yahaan tak ke jab yajooj majooj khol diye jayenge aur har bulandi se woh nikal padenge

Aur wada bar haqq ke poora hone ka waqt qareeb aa lagega to yakayak un logon ke deedhey phatey ke phatey reh jayenge (fixedly stare in horror), jinhon ne kufr kiya tha. Kahenge “haaye hamari kambakhti, hum is cheez ki taraf se gaflat mein padey huey thay, balke hum khatakaar thay.”
Beshak tum aur tumhare woh mabood jinhein tum poojhte ho, jahannum ka indhan (fuel) hain, wahin tumko jana hai
Agar yeh waqayi khuda hotey to wahan na jatey, ab sabko hamesha usi mein rehna hai.”
Wahaan woh phunkare maarenge (groan/roar) aur haal yeh hoga ke usmein kaan padi aawaaz na sunayi degi
Rahey woh log jinke liye hamari taraf se bhalayi ka pehle hi faisla ho chuka hoga, to woh yaqeenan ussey door rakkhey jayenge
Uski sarsarahat tak na sunenge aur woh hamesha hamesha apni mann bhati cheezon ke darmiyan rahenge
Woh intihayi ghabrahat ka waqt unko zara pareshan na karega, aur malaika badh kar unko haathon haath lenge ke “yeh tumhara wahi din hai jiska tumse waada kiya jaata tha”

Woh din jabke aasman ko hum yun lapeit kar rakh denge jaise tumar mein awraaq lapeit diye jatey hain (leaves of paper are rolled up in a written scroll) jis tarah pehle humne takhleeq ki ibtida ki thi usi tarah hum phir uska iaada (originate) karenge. Yeh ek wada hai hamare zimme, aur yeh kaam humein bahr-haal karna hai
Aur Zaboor mein hum naseehat ke baad yeh likh chuke hain ke zameen ke waris hamare neik banday hongey
Is mein ek badi khabar hai ibadat guzar logon ke liye
(Aey Muhammad), humne jo tumko bheja hai to yeh dar-asal duniya walon ke haqq mein hamari rehmat hai
Insey kaho, “mere paas jo wahee aati hai woh yeh hai ke tumhara khuda sirf ek khuda hai, phir kya tum sar-e-itaat jhukate ho?”
Agar woh mooh pherein to kehdo “maine alal-ailaan (openly) tumko khabardaar kardiya hai. Ab yeh main nahin jaanta ke woh cheez jiska tumse wada kiya jaa raha hai qareeb hai ya door
Allah woh baatein bhi jaanta hai jo ba-awaaz buland kahi jati hain aur woh bhi jo tum chupa kar karte ho
Main to yeh samajhta hoon ke shayad yeh (dair/delay) tumhare liye ek fitna hai aur tumhein ek waqt e khaas tak ke liye mazay karne ka mauqa diya jaa raha hai”
(aakhi-e-kaar) Rasool ne kaha “aey mere Rubb, haqq ke saath faisla karde, aur logon, tum jo baatein banate ho unke muqable mein hamara Rubb-e-Rehman hi hamare liye madad ka sahara hai.”
Logon, apne Rubb ke gazab se bacho, haqeeqat yeh hai ke qayamat ka zalzala badi (haulnaak) cheez hai

Jis roz tum usey dekhoge, haal yeh hoga ke har doodh pilane wali apne doodh peetay bacchey se gaafil ho jayegi, har haamila (pregnant) ka hamal gir jayega, aur log tumko madhosh nazar aayenge, halanke woh nashey mein na hongey, balke Allah ka azaab hi kuch aisa sakht hoga
Baaz log aisey hain jo ilm ke bagair Allah ke barey mein bahas karte hain aur har shaytaan e sarkash ki pairwi karne lagte hain
Halanke uske to naseeb hi mein yeh likha hai ke jo usko dost banayega usey woh gumraah karke chodega aur azaab e jahannum ka raasta dikhayega

Logon, agar tumhein zindagi baad e maut ke barey mein kuch shakk hai to tumhein maloom ho ke humne tumko mitti se paida kiya hai, phir nutfe se,phir khoon ke lothdey se, phir gosht ki boti se jo shakal waali bhi hoti hai aur be shakal bhi ( yeh hum isliye bata rahey hain) taa-ke tumpar haqeeqat wazeh kardein, hum jis (nutfe) ko chahte hain ek khaas waqt tak rehemo (wombs) mein thehraye rakhte hain, phir tumko ek bacchey ki surat mein nikal latey hain, (phir tumhein parwarish karte hain) taa-ke tum apni poori jawani ko pahuncho aur tum mein se koi pehle hi wapas bula liya jata hai aur koi badhtareen umar ki taraf pher diya jata hai, taa-ke sab kuch jaanney ke baad phir kuch na janey. Aur tum dekhte ho ke zameen sukhi padi hai, phir jahan humne uspar meh barsaya ke yakayak woh phabak uthi aur phool gayi aur usne har qisam ki khush manzar nabataat(vegetation) ugalni shuri kardi
Ye sab kuch is wajah se hai ke Allah hi haqq hai, aur woh murdon ko zinda karta hai, aur woh har cheez par qadir hai
Aur yeh (is baat ki daleel hai) ke qayamat ki ghadi aakar rahegi, is mein kisi shakk ki gunjaish nahin, aur Allah zaroor un logon ko uthayega jo qabaron mein jaa chuke hain
Baaz log aisey hain jo kisi ilm aur hidayat aur roshni bakshne wali kitaab ke bagair, gardan akdaye huey
Khuda ke barey mein jhagadte hain, taa-ke logon ko raah e khuda se bhatka dein. Aisey shaks ke liye duniya mein ruswayi hai aur qayamat ke roz usko hum aag ke azaab ka maza chakkhayenge
Yeh hai tera woh mustaqbil (future) jo tere apne haathon ne tere liye tayyar kiya hai, warna Allah apne bandon par zulm karne wala nahin hai

Aur logon mein koi aisa hai jo kinare par reh kar Allah ki bandagi karta hai, agar faiyda hua to mutmaeen hogaya aur jo koi museebat aa gayi to ulta phir gaya. Uski duniya bhi gayi aur aakhirat bhi, yeh hai sareeh khasara (loss/nuksaan)
Phir woh Allah ko chodh kar unko pukarta hai jo na usko nuqsaan pahuncha sakte hain na faiyda, yeh hai gumrahi ki inteha
Woh unko pukarta hai jinka nuqsaan unke nafey (faiyda) se qareeb tar hai, badhtareen hai us ka maula (guardian) aur badtareen hai uska rafeeq(companion)
(iske baraks) Allah un logon ko jo iman laye aur jinon ne neik amal kiye, yaqeenan aisi jannaton mein dakhil karega jinke nichey nehrein beh rahi hongi. Allah karta hai jo kuch chahta hai

Jo shaks yeh gumaan rakhta ho ke Allah duniya aur aakhirat mein uski koi madad na karega usey chahiye ke ek rassi (rope) ke zariye aasmaan tak pahunch kar shigaf lagaye(cut a hole into it), phir dekh le ke aaya uski tadbeer kisi aisi cheez ko radd kar sakti hai jo usko nagawar hai
Aisi hi khuli khuli baaton ke saath humne is Quran ko nazil kiya hai, aur hidayat Allah jisey chahta hai deta hai

Jo log iman laye, aur jo yahudi huey, aur sabayi (Sabaeans), aur nasara ,aur majoos, aur jin logon ne shirk kiya, un sab ke darmiyan Allah qayamat ke roz faisla kardega. Har cheez Allah ki nazar mein hai

Kya tum dekhte nahin ho ke Allah ke aagey sar-ba-sujood hain woh sab jo aasmano mein hain aur jo zameen mein hain, Suraj aur chand aur taarey aur pahad aur darakht aur jaanwar aur bahut se Insaan aur bahut se woh log bhi jo azaab ke mustahiq ho chuke hain? aur jisey Allah zaleel-o-khwar karde usey phir koi izzat dene wala nahin hai. Allah karta hai jo kuch chahta hai

Yeh do fareeq hain jinke darmiyan apne Rubb ke maamle ka jhagda hai. In mein se woh log jinhon ne kufr kiya hai unke liye aag ke libaas kaatey ja chuke hain, unke saron (heads) par khaulta (boiling) hua pani dala jayega
Jissey unki khalein (skins) hi nahin pait ke andar ke hissey tak gal (melt) jayenge
Aur unki khabar lene ke liye lohey (iron) ke gurz (maces) honge
Jab kabhi woh ghabra kar jahannum se nikalne ki koshish karenge phir usi mein dhakeil diye jayenge ke chakkho ab jalne ki saza ka maza

(Dusri taraf) jo log iman laaye aur jinhon ne neik amal kiye unko Allah aisi jannaton mein dakhil karega jinke nichey nehrein beh rahi hongi, wahan woh soonay ke kangano aur motiyon se aarasta kiye jayenge aur unke libas resham ke honge
Unko pakeeza baat kabool karne ki hidayat bakshi gayi aur unhein khudaye satuda siffat (All Praiseworthy) ka raasta dikhaya gaya

Jin logon ne kufr kiya aur jo (aaj) Allah ke raaste se rok rahey hain aur us masjid e haram ki ziyarat mein maney hain jisey humne sab logon ke liye banaya hai, jismein muqami bashindon aur bahar se aane walon ke huqooq barabar hain, (unki rawish yaqeenan saza ki mustahiq hai), is (masjid e haram) mein jo bhi raasti se hatkar (deviate from righteousness) zulm ka tareeqa ikhtiyar karega usey hum dardnaak azaab ka maza chakhayenge

Yaad karo woh waqt jab humne Ibrahim ke liye is ghar (khane Kaaba) ki jagah tajweez ki thi (is hidayat ke saath) ke “mere saath kisi cheez ko shareek na karo, aur mere ghar ko tawaf karne walon aur qayam va ruku va sujood karne walon ke liye paak rakho
Aur logon ko hajj ke liye izan e aam (proclamation) de do ke woh tumhare paas har door daraz muqaam se paidal aur ounton(camels) par sawar aayein

Taa-ke woh faiyde dekhein jo yahan unke liye rakkhe gaye hain, aur chandh muqarrar dino mein un jaanwaron par Allah ka naam lein jo usne unhein bakshe hain, khud bhi khayein aur tang-dast mohtaj ko bhi dein
Phir apna mail-kuchel (dirt) door karein aur apni nazrein (vows) poori karein, aur us qadeem (ancient) ghar ka tawaf karein

Yeh tha (taamir e kaaba ka maqsad) aur jo koi Allah ki qayam karda hurmaton (sanctity) ka ehtamam karey to yeh uske Rubb ke nazdeek khud usi keliye behtar hai. Aur tumhare liye maweshi (cattle) jaanwar halal kiye gaye , ma siwa un cheezon ke jo tumhein batayi jaa chuki hain. Pas buthon(Idols) ki gandagi se bacho, jhooti baaton se parheiz karo

Yaksu hokar Allah ke banday bano, uske saath kisi ko shareek na karo aur jo koi Allah ke saath shirk karey to goya woh aasmaan se gir gaya, ab ya to usey parinday uchak le jayenge ya hawa usko aisi jagah le jaa kar phenk degi jahan uske cheethdey udh (shattered into pieces) jayenge
Yeh hai asal maamla (isey samajh lo), aur jo Allah ke muqarrar karda shaair (sanctity) ka ehtaram karey to yeh dilon ke taqwa se hai
Tumhein ek waqt e muqarrar tak un (hadi ke jaanwaron) se faiyda uthane ka haqq hai phir un (ke qurbaan karne) ki jagah usi qadeem ghar ke paas hai

Har ummat ke liye humne qurbani ka ek qaida muqarrar kardiya hai taa-ke (us ummat ke log) un jaanwaron par Allah ka naam lein jo usne unko bakshey hain (in mukhtalif tareeqon ke andar maqsad ek hi hai). Pas tumhara khuda ek hi khuda hi aur usi ke tum mutii e farmaan bano. Aur aey Nabi, basharat de de aajizana (humble ) rawish ikhtiyar karne walon ko

Jinka haal yeh hai ke Allah ka zikr sunte hain to unke dil kaanp uthte hain, jo museebat bhi unpar aati hai uspar sabr karte hain, namaz qayam karte hai, aur jo kuch rizq humne unko diya hai us mein se kharch karte hain

Aur (qurbani ke) ounton (camels) ko humne tumhare liye shaaer-Allah (symbols of Allah) mein shamil kiya hai, tumhare liye un mein bhalayi hai. Pas unhein khada karke unpar Allah ka naam lo, aur jab (qurbani ke baad) unki peethein zameen par tik jayein to unmein se khud bhi khao aur unko bhi khilao jo qanaat kiye baithe hain (contented ones) aur unko bhi jo apni haajat pesh karein. In jaanwaron ko humne is tarah tumhare liye musakkhar kiya hai taa-ke tum shukriya ada karo

Na unke gosht Allah ko pahunchte hain na khoon, magar usey tumhara taqwa pahunchta hai. Usne unko tumhare liye is tarah musakkhar kiya hai taa-ke uski bakshi hui hidayat par tum uski takbeer karo. Aur (aey Nabi), basharat dedo neikukar logon ko
Yaqeenan Allah mudafiyat (defends) karta hai un logon ki taraf se jo iman laye hain. Yaqeenan Allah kisi khain (treacherous) kafir e niyamat ko pasand nahin karta
Ijazat de di gayi un logon ko jinke khilaf jung ki jaa rahi hai, kyunke woh mazloom hain, aur Allah yaqeenan unki madad par qadir hai

Yeh woh log hain jo apne gharon se na-haqq nikal diye gaye sirf is kasoor par ke woh kehte thay “hamara Rubb Allah hai”. Agar Allah logon ko ek dusre ke zariye dafa na karta rahey to khanqahein (monasteries), aur girja (churches) aur mabad (synagogues) aur masjidein, jin mein Allah ka kasrat se naam liye jata hai, sab mismaar (demolished) kar daali jayein. Allah zaroor un logon ki madad karega jo uski madad karenge. Allah bada taaqatwar aur zabardast hai

Yeh woh log hain jinhein agar hum zameen mein iqtedar bakshein to woh namaz qayam karenge, zakat denge, maroof (bhalayi) ka hukum denge aur munkar (burayi) se mana karenge aur tamaam maamlaat ka anjaam kaar Allah ke haath mein hai
(Aey Nabi), agar woh tumhein jhutlate hain to unse pehle qaum e Nooh aur Aad aur Samood
Aur qaum e Ibrahim aur qaum e Lut
Aur ehle madyan bhi jhutla chuke hain aur Moosa bhi jhutlaye jaa chuke hain. Un sab munkireen ko maine pehle mohlat di , phir pakad liya. Ab dekhlo ke meri uqubat(chastisement) kaisi thi
Kitni hi khatakar bastiyan hain jinko humne tabaah kiya hai aur aaj woh apni chathon (roofs) par ulti padi hain, kitne hi kuwein (wells) bekar aur kitne hi qasr (castle) khandar bani huey hain

Kya yeh log zameen mein chale phire nahin hain ke inke dil samajhne waley aur inke kaan sunney waley hotey? Haqeeqat yeh hai ke aankhein andhi nahin hoti magar woh dil andhey ho jatey hain jo seeno mein hain
Yeh log azaab ke liye jaldi macha rahey hain. Allah hargiz apne wadey ke khilaf na karega, magar tere Rubb ke haan ka ek din tumhare shumar ke hazaar baras ke barabar hua karta hai
Kitni hi bastiyan hain jo zalim thi, maine uno pehle mohlat di, phir pakad liya aur sab ko wapas to mere paas hi aana hai
(Aey Muhammad), kehdo ke “ logon, main to tumhare liye sirf woh shaks hoon jo (bura waqt aane se pehle) saaf saaf khabardar karne wala ho
Phir jo iman layenge aur neik amal karenge unke liye magfirat hai aur izzat ki rozi
Aur jo hamari aayat ko neecha dikhane ki koshish karenge woh dozakh ke yaar hain

Aur (aey Muhammad) tumse pehle humne na koi Rasool aisa bheja hai na Nabi (jiske saath yeh maamla na pesh aaya ho ke) jab usne tamanna ki, shaytan uski tamanna mein khalal andaz ho gaya. Is tarah jo kuch bhi shaytan khalal andaziyan karta hai Allah unko mita deta hai aur apni aayat ko pukhta (confirm) kardeta hai. Allah aleem hai aur hakeem

(Woh is liye aisa honay deta hai) taa-ke shaytan ki daali hui kharabi ko fitna bana de un logon ke liye jinke dilon ko [nifaq ka (hypocrisy)] rog laga hua hai aur jinke dil khotay hain. Haqeeqat yeh hai ke yeh zalim log inaad (enmity) mein bahut door nikal gaye hain

Aur ilam se behramand log jaan lein ke yeh haqq hai tere Rubb ki taraf se aur woh ispar iman le aayein aur unke dil iske aagey jhuk jaayein. Yaqeenan Allah iman laney walon ko hamesha seedha raasta dikha deta hai
Inkar karne waley to iski taraf se shakk hi mein padey rahenge yaha tak ke ya to unpar qayamat ki ghadi achanak aa jaye, ya ek manhoos din ka azaab nazil ho jaye
Us roz baadshahi Allah ki hogi aur woh unke darmiyan faisla kardega. Jo iman rakhne waley aur amal e saleh karne waley hongey woh niyamat bhari jannaton mein jayenge
Aur jinhon ne kufr kiya hoga aur hamari aayat ko jhutlaya hoga unke liye ruswakun azaab hoga
Aur jin logon ne Allah ki raah mein hijrat ki, phir qatal kardiye gaye ya marr gaye, Allah unko accha rizq dega aur yaqeenan Allah hi behtareen raaziq hai
Woh unhein aisi jagah pahunchayega jissey woh khush ho jayenge. Beshak Allah aleem (all knowing) aur haleem (Most Forbearing) hai

Yeh to hai unka haal, aur jo koi badla le, waisa hi jaisa uske saath kiya gaya, aur phir uspar zyadati bhi ki gayi ho, to Allah uski madad zaroor karega. Allah maaf karne wala aur darguzar karne wala hai
Yeh is liye ke raat se din aur din se raat nikalne wala Allah hi hai aur woh sami (sunney waala/ hears everything) o baseer (dekhne wala /sees everything) hai
Yeh isliye ke Allah hi haqq hai aur woh sab baatil hain jinhein Allah ko chodh kar yeh log pukarte hain. Aur Allah hi baaladast (Supreme) aur buzurg (Exalted One) hai
Kya tum dekhte nahin ho ke Allah aasman se pani barsata hai aur uski badaulat zameen sar-sabz ho jaati hai? Haqeeqat yeh hai ke woh lateef o khabeer hai (fully aware of everything)
Usi ka hai jo kuch aasmano mein hai aur jo kuch zameen mein hai. Beshak wahi gani (All-Sufficient/ free of all wants) o hameed (praiseworthy) hai

Kya tum dekhte nahin ho ke usne woh sab kuch tumhare liye musakkhar kar rakkha hai jo zameen mein hai, aur usi ne kashti ko qaide ka paband banaya hai ke woh uske hukum se samandar mein chalti hai, aur wahi aasmaan ko is tarah thamey huey ke uske izan ke bagair woh zameen par nahin gir sakta? Waqia yeh hai ke Allah logon ke haqq mein bada shafeeq (very Kind) aur raheem (merciful) hai
Wahi hai jisne tumhein zindagi bakshi hai, wahi tumko maut deta hai aur whai phir tumko zinda karega, sach yeh hai ke Insaan bada hi munkir e haqq hai

Har ummat ke liye humne ek tareeq-e-ibadat muqarrar kiya hai jiski woh pairwi karti hai, pas (aey Muhammad), woh is maamle mein tumse jhagda na karein, tum apne Rubb ki taraf dawat do, yaqeenan tum seedhey raaste par ho
Aur agar woh tumse jhagdein to kehdo ke “jo kuch tum kar rahey ho Allah ko khoob maloom hai
Allah qayamat ke roz tumhare darmiyan un sab baaton ka faisla kardega jin mein tum ikhtilaf karte rahey ho”
Kya tum nahin jaante ke aasman o zameen ki har cheez Allah ke ilam mein hai? Sab kuch ek kitaab mein darj hai. Allah keliye yeh kuch bhi mushkil nahin hai

Yeh log Allah ko chodh kar unki ibadat kar rahey hain jinke liye na to usne koi sanad(authority) nazil ki hai aur na yeh khud unke barey mein koi ilam rakhte hain. In zalimon ke liye koi madadgaar nahin hai

Aur jab inko hamari saaf saaf aayat sunayi jati hain to tum dekhte ho ke munkireen e haqq ke chehre bigadne lagte hain aur aisa mehsoos hota hai ke abhi woh un logon par toot padenge jo unhein hamari aayat sunate hain. Inse kaho “ main bataoon tumhein ke issey badhtar cheez kya hai? Aag, Allah ne usi ka wada un logon ke haqq mein kar rakkha hai jo qabool e haqq se inkar karein, aur woh bahut hi bura thikana hai”

Logon, ek misaal di jaati hai, gaur se suno, jin maboodon ko tum khuda ko chodh kar pukarte ho woh sab milkar ek makkhi (fly) bhi paida karna chahein to nahin kar sakte, balke agar makkhi unse koi cheez cheen le jaaye to woh usey chuda bhi nahin sakte. Madad chahne waley bhi kamzoar aur jinse madad chahi jati hai woh bhi kamzoar
In logon ne Allah ki qadar hi na pehchani jaisa ke uske pehchanne ka haqq hai , waqia yeh hai ke quwwat aur izzat wala to Allah hi hai

Haqeeqat yeh hai ke Allah [apne faramin ki tarsil ke liye(to convey His decrees)] malaika (Farishtey) mein se bhi paigham rasaan muntakhab (choose) karta hai aur Insaano mein se bhi. Woh Sami (sunney waala) aur baseer (dekhne waala) hai
Jo kuch unke saamne hai usey bhi woh jaanta hai aur jo kuch unse ojhal (hidden/behind) hai ussey bhi woh waqif hai, aur saarey maamlaat usi ki taraf rujoo hotey hain
Aey logon jo iman laye ho, ruku aur sajda karo, apne Rubb ki bandagi karo, aur neik kaam karo, shayad ke tumko falaah naseeb ho

Allah ki raah mein jihad karo jaisa ke jihad karne ka haqq hai, usne tumhein apne kaam ke liye chun liya hai aur deen mein tumpar koi tanggi nahin rakkhi. Qayam ho jao apne baap Ibrahim ki millat par. Allah ne pehle bhi tumhara naam “Muslim” rakkha tha aur is (Quran) mein bhi (tumhara yahi naam hai) taa-ke Rasool tumpar gawah ho aur tum logon par gawah. Pas namaz qayam karo, zakaat do aur Allah se wabista ho jao (hold fast to Allah), woh hai tumhara maula (guardian), bahut hi accha hai woh maula aur bahut hi accha hai woh madadgaar
Yaqeenan falaah payi hai iman laney walon ne jo
Apni namaz mein khushu ikhtiyar karte hain (Salat with humility)
Laghviyat (vain things) se door rehte hain
Zakaat ke tareeqe par aamil hotey hain
Apni sharmgaahon ki hifazat karte hain
Siwaye apni biwiyon ke aur un auraton ke jo unki milk e yameen mein hon (right hand posseses) ke unpar (mehfooz na rakhne mein) woh qabil e malamat nahin hain
Albatta jo uske alawa kuch aur chahein wahi zyadati karne waley hain
Apni amanaton (trusts) aur apne ahad o paiman (promises) ka paas rakhte hain
Aur apni namazon ki muhafizat (hifazat) karte hain
Yahi log woh waris hain
Jo miraas mein firdous payenge aur usmein hamesha rahenge
Humne Insaan ko mitti ke saatt (essence of clay) se banaya
Phir usey ek mehfooz jaga tapki hui boondh mein tabdeel kiya

Phir us boondh ko lothday ki shakal di, phir lothday ko boti bana diya, phir boti ki haddiyan (bones) banayin, phir haddiyon par gosht chadhaya. Phir usey ek dusri hi makhlooq bana khada kiya. Pas bada hi ba-barakat hai Allah, sab karigaron se accha kaarigar(creator)
Phir iske baad tumko zaroor marna hai
Phir qayamat ke roz yaqeenan tum uthaye jaogey
Aur tumhare upar humne saat (seven) raastey banaye, takhleeq ke kaam se hum kuch na-balad na thay (We are never unmindful of (our) Creation
Aur aasmaan se humne theek hisaab ke mutabiq ek khaas miqdar mein pani utara aur usko zameen mein thehara diya. Hum usey jis tarah chahein gayab kar sakte hain
Phir is pani ke zariye se humne tumhare liye khajoor aur angoor ke baagh paida kardiye, tumhare liye in baaghon mein bahut se lazeez phal hain aur unsey tum rozi haasil karte ho
Aur woh darakht bhi humne paida kiya jo Tur-e-seena (mount sinai) se nikalta hai, teil (oil) bhi liye huey ugta hai aur khane walon ke liye saalan bhi

Aur haqeeqat yeh hai ke tumhare liye maweshiyon mein bhi ek sabaq hai unke paithon (bellies) mein jo kuch hai usi mein se ek cheez hum tumhein pilatey hain, aur tumhare liye unmein bahut se dusre faiyde bhi hain
Unko tum khate ho aur unpar aur kashtiyon par sawaar bhi kiye jatey ho
Humne Nooh ko uski qaum ki taraf bheja, usne kaha “ aey meri qaum ke logon, Allah ki bandagi karo, uske siwa tumhare liye koi aur mabood nahin hai, kya tum darte nahin ho?”

Uski qaum ke jin sardaaron ne maanne se inkar kiya woh kehne lagey ke “yeh shaks kuch nahin hai magar ek bashar(Insaan) tum hi jaisa. Iski garz yeh hai ke tumpar bartari (superiority) haasil karey. Allah ko agar bhejna hota to farishtey bhejta.Yeh baat to humne kabhi apne baap dada ke waqton mein suni hi nahin ( ke bashar Rasool bankar aaye)
Kuch nahin , bas is aadmi ko zara junoon lahaq(possessed) ho gaya hai, kuch muddat aur dekhlo [ ( shayad ifaqa ho jaaye)( may be he is cured)]”
Nooh ne kaha “parwardigar, in logon ne jo meri takzeeb ki hai ispar ab tu hi meri nusrat farma.”

Humne uspar wahee ki ke “hamari nigrani mein aur hamari wahee ke mutabiq kashti (ark) tayyar kar. Phir jab hamara hukum aa jaye aur tannur ubal paday to har qisam ke jaanwaron mein se ek ek joda lekar usmein sawaar ho ja, aur apne ehal o ayaal ko bhi saath le, siwai unke jinke khilaf pehle faisla ho chuka hai, aur zaalimon ke maamle mein mujhse kuch na kehna, yeh ab garq (doob/ drown) honay waley hain
Phir jab tu apne saathiyon sameth kashti par sawar ho jaye to keh, shukar hai us khuda ka jisne humein zaalim logon se nijaat di
Aur keh, parwardigar, mujhko barakat wali jagah utaar aur tu behtareen jagah dene wala hai.”
Is qissey mein badi nishaniyan hain aur aazmaish to hum karke hi rehte hain
Inke baad humne ek dusre daur ki qaum uthayi
Phir un mein khud unhi ki qaum ka ek Rasool bheja ( jisne unhein dawat di) ke Allah ki bandagi karo, tumhare liye uske siwa koi aur maabood nahin hai, kya tum darte nahin ho

Uski qaum ke jin sardaron ne maanne se inkar kiya aur aakhirat ki peshi ko jhutlaya, jinko humne duniya ki zindagi mein aasuda kar rakkha tha, woh kehne lagey “ye shaks kuch nahin hai magar ek bashar tum hi jaisa, jo kuch tum khate ho wahi yeh khata hai aur jo kuch tum peete ho wahi yeh peeta hai
Ab agar tumne apne hi jaise ek bashar ki itaat qabool karli to tum ghatay hi mein rahey
Yeh tumhein ittila deta hai ke jab tum mar kar mitti ho jaogey aur haddiyon ka panjar reh jaogey us waqt tum (qabaron se) nikale jaogey
Baeed (far/Impossible), bilkul baeed(Impossible) hai yeh wada jo tumse kiya jaa raha hai
Zindagi kuch nahin hai magar bas yahi duniya ki zindagi. Yahin humko marna aur jeena hai aur hum hargiz uthaye janey waley nahin hain
Yeh shaks khuda ke naam par mehaz jhoot ghadh raha hai aur hum kabhi iske maanne waley nahin hain.”
Rasool ne kaha “parwardigar , in logon ne jo meri takzeeb ki hai, ispar ab tu hi meri nusrat farma”
Jawab mein irshad hua “qareeb hai woh waqt jab yeh apne kiye par pachtayenge”
Aakhir e kaar theek theek haqq ke mutabiq ek hungama e azeem ne unko aa liya aur humne inko kachra bana kar phenk diya. Door ho zaalim qaum
Phir humne unke baad dusri qaumein uthayi
Koi qaum na apne waqt se pehle khatam hui aur na uske baad thehar saki

Phir humne pai dar pai apne Rasool bheje. Jis qaum ke paas bhi uska Rasool aaya, usne usey jhutlaya, aur hum ek ke baad ek qaum ko halaak karte chale gaye hatta ke unko bas afsana hi bana kar choda, phitkar un logon par jo iman nahin laatey
Phir humne Moosa aur uske bhai Haroon ko apni nishaniyon aur khuli sanad ke saath Firoun aur uske ayaan sultanat ki taraf bheja
Magar unhon ne takabbur (arrogance) kiya aur badi dunki li
Kehne lage “Kya hum apne hi jaise do aadmiyon par iman le aayein? Aur aadmi bhi woh jinki qaum hamari bandi (ghulam) hai”
Pas unhon ne dono ko jhutla diya aur halaak honay walon mein jaa miley
Aur Moosa ko humne kitaab ata farmayi taa-ke log ussey rehnumayi haasil karein
Aur Ibne Maryam aur uski maa ko humne ek nishani banaya aur unko ek sateh murtafa (shelter on a plateau) par rakkha jo itminaan ki jagah thi aur chashme usmein jaari thay
Aey paigambaron, khao paak cheezein aur amal karo saleh, tum jo kuch bhi karte ho, main usko khoob jaanta hoon
Aur yeh tumhari yeh ummat ek hi ummat hai aur main tumhara Rubb hoon, pas mujhi se tum daro
Magar baad mein logon ne apne deen (religion) ko aapas mein tukde tukde karliya, har giroh ke paas jo kuch hai usi mein woh magan hai
Accha, to chodo inhein, doobey rahein apni gaflat mein ek waqt e khaas tak
Kya yeh samajhte hain ke hum jo inhein maal o aulad se madad diye jaa rahey hain
To goya inhein bhalaiyan dene mein sargarm hain? Nahin, asal maamle ka inhein shaour nahin hai
Jo apne Rubb ke khauf se darey rehte hain
Jo Rubb ki aayat par iman latey hain
Jo apne Rubb ke saath kisi ko shareek nahin karte
Aur jinka haal yeh hai ke detay hain jo kuch bhi detay hain aur dil unke is khayal se kaampte rehte hain ke humein apne Rubb ki taraf palatna hai
Bhalaiyon ki taraf daudne waley aur sabaqat karke unhein paa lene waley to dar-haqeeqat woh log hain

Hum kisi shaks ko uski maqdart (taaqat) se zyada ki takleef nahin detay aur humare paas ek kitaab hai jo (har ek ka haal) theek theek bata dene wali hai, aur logon par zulm bahr-haal nahin kiya jayega
Magar yeh log is maamle se be-khabar hain aur inke aamal bhi is tareeqe se ( jiska upar zikr kiya gaya hai) mukhtalif hain. Woh apne yeh karoot kiye chale jayenge
Yahan tak ke jab hum unke ayyashon (affluent ones /aasuda haal) ko azaab mein pakad lenge to phir woh dakrana shuru kar denge (begin to bellow /cry)
Ab bandh karo apni fariyad o fugaan, hamari taraf se ab koi madad tumhein nahin milni
Meri aayat sunayi jati thi to tum (Rasool ki aawaz sunte hi) ultay paon bhaag nikalte thay
Apne ghamand mein usko khatir hi mein na latey thay,apne chaoupalon (meeting places) mein unpar baatein chaant-te (ridiculed him) aur bakwas kiya karte thay
To kya in logon ne kabhi is kalaam par gaur nahin kiya? Ya woh koi aisi baat laya hai jo kabhi inke aslaaf (forefathers) ke paas na aayi thi
Ya yeh apne Rasool se kabhi ke waqif na thay ke (anjaana aadmi honay ke baais) ussey bidakte hain
Ya ye is baat ke qayal hain ke woh majnoon [possessed (by a jinn)] hai? Nahin, balke woh haqq laya hai aur haqq hi inki aksariyat (most) ko nagawar hai

Aur haqq agar kahin inki khwaishaat ke peechey chalta to zameen aur aasman aur inki saari aabaadi ka nizam darham barham ho jata. Nahin, balke hum unka apna hi zikar unke paas laaye hain aur woh apne zikr se mooh moad rahey hain
Kya tu insey kuch maang raha hai? Tere liye tere Rubb ka diya hi behtar hai aur woh behtareen raziq hai
Tu to unko seedhey raaste ki taraf bula raha hai
Magar jo log aakhirat ko nahin maante woh raah e raast se hat kar chalna chahte hain
Agar hum inpar reham karein aur woh takleef jis mein aaj kal yeh mubtila hain door kardein to yeh apni sarkashi mein bilkul hi behak jayenge
Inka haal to yeh hai ke humne unhein takleef mein mubtila kiya, phir bhi yeh apne Rubb ke aagey na jhuke aur na aajizi (humble)ikhtiyar karte hain
Albatta jab naubat yahan tak pahunch jayegi ke hum inpar sakht azaab ka darwaza khol denge to yakayak tum dekhoge ke us halat mein ye har khair se mayous hain
Woh Allah hi to hai jisne tumhein sunney aur dekhne ki quwwatein di aur sochne ko dil diye , magar tum log kam hi shukarguzar hotey ho
Wahi hai jisne tumhein zameen mein phaylaya, aur usi ki taraf tum sametay jaogey
Wahi zindagi bakashta hai aur wahi maut deta hai, gardish e layl (raat) o nahar (din) usi ke qabze qudrat mein hai. Kya tumhari samajh mein yeh baat nahin aati
Magar yeh log wahi kuch kehte hain jo unke peshraw (forefathers) keh chuke hain
Yeh kehte hain “kya jab hum marr kar mitti ho jayenge aur haddiyon ka panjar ban kar reh jayenge to humko phir zinda karke uthaya jayega
Humne bhi yeh wadey bahut sunay hain aur humse pehle hamare baap dada bhi suntey rahey hain. Yeh mehaz afasana haye pareena hain(ancient tales)”
Insey kaho, batao agar tum jaante ho, ke yeh zameen aur iski saari aabaadi kiski hai
Yeh zaroor kahenge ke Allah ki, kaho phir tum hosh mein kyun nahin aatey
Insey pucho, saato (seven) aasmaano aur arsh-e-azeem ka maalik kaun hai
Yeh zaroor kahenge Allah, kaho phir tum darte kyun nahin
Insey kaho, batao agar tum jaante ho ke har cheez par iqtedaar kiska hai? Aur kaun hai woh jo panaah deta hai aur uske muqable mein koi panaah nahin de sakta
Yeh zaroor kahenge ke yeh baat to Allah hi keliye hai. Kaho, phir kahan se tumko dhoka lagta hai
Jo amr e haqq hai woh hum inke saamne le aaye hain, aur koi shakk nahin ke yeh log jhotey hain

Allah ne kisi ko apni aulaad nahin banaya hai aur koi dusra khuda uske saath nahin hai. Agar aisa hota to har khuda apni khalq ko lekar alag ho jaata, aur phir woh ek dusre par chadh daudte.Paak hai Allah un baaton se jo yeh log banate hain
Khule aur chupe ka jaanne wala, woh baalatar hai us shirk se jo yeh log tajweez kar rahey hain
(Aey Muhammad) dua karo ke “parwardigar, jis azaab ki inko dhamki di jaa rahi hai woh agar meri maujoodgi mein tu laye
To aey mere Rubb, mujhey in zaalim logon mein shamil na kijiyo”
Aur haqeeqat yeh hai ke hum tumhari aankhon ke saamne hi woh cheez le aane ki poori qudrat rakhte hain jiski dhamki hum unhein de rahey hain
(Aey Nabi), burayi ko is tareeqe se dafa karo jo behtareen ho jo kuch baatein woh tumpar banate hain woh humein khoob maloom hai
Aur dua karo ke “parwardigar, main shayateen ki uksahaton(waswason) se teri panaah maangta hoon
Balke aey mere Rubb, main to issey bhi teri panaah maanga hoon ke woh mere paas aayein”

(yeh log apni karni se baaz na aayenge) yahan tak ke jab in mein se kisi ko maut aa jayegi to kehna shuru kardega ke “Aey mere Rubb, mujhey usi duniya mein wapas bhej dijiye jisey main chodh aaya hoon
Umeed hai ke ab main neik amal karunga”. Hargiz nahin, yeh to bas ek baat hai jo woh bakk raha hai. Ab in sab (marne waalon) ke peechey ek barzakh (barrier) hayal hai dusri zindagi ke din tak
Phir junhi ke Sur (trumphet) phoonk diya gaya, unke darmiyan phir koi rishta na rahega aur na woh ek dusre ko puchenge
Us waqt jinke padle (scales) bhari hongey wahi falaah payenge
Aur jinke padle (scales) halke honge wahi log hongey jinhon ne apne aap ko ghatay mein daal liya. Woh jahannum mein hamesha rahenge
Aag unke chehron ki khaal chaat jayegi aur unke jabde (jaws) bahar nikal aayenge
“kya tum wahi log nahin ho ke meri aayat tumhein sunayi jati thi to tum unhein jhutlate thay?”
Woh kahenge “aey hamare Rubb, hamari badbakhti hum par chaa gayi thi, hum waqayi gumraah log thay
Aey parwardigar, ab humein yahan se nikaal de phir hum aisa kasoor karein to zaalim hongey”
Allah taala jawab dega “ door ho mere saamne se, padey raho isi mein aur mujhse baat na karo
Tum wahi log to ho ke mere kuch banday jab kehte thay ke aye hamare parwardigar, hum iman laye, humein maaf karde, humpar reham kar, tu sab raheemon se accha raheem hai
To tumne unka mazaaq bana liye, yahan tak ke unki zidd ne tumhein yeh bhi bhula diya ke main bhi koi hoon, aur tum unpar haste rahey
Aaj unke us sabr ka maine yeh phal diya hai ke wahi kamiyaab hain”
Phir Allah taala unse puchega “batao,zameen mein tum kitne saal rahey?”
Woh kahenge “ ek din ya din ka bhi kuch hissa hum wahan thehre hain, shumaar karne walon se pooch lijiye”
Irshad hoga “ thodi hi dair thehre ho na, kaash tumne yeh us waqt jana hota
Kya tumne yeh samajh rakkha tha ke humne tumhein fizul(bekar) hi paida kiya hai aur tumhein hamari taraf kabhi palatna hi nahin hai?”
Pas baala o bartar hai Allah , baadshah e haqiqi, koi khuda uske siwa nahin, maalik hai arsh e buzurg ka
Aur jo koi Allah ke saath kisi aur maabood ko pukare, jiske liye uske paas koi daleel nahin, to uska hisaab uske Rubb ke paas hai. Aisey kafir kabhi falaah nahin paa sakte
(Aey Muhammad) kaho, “Mere Rubb darguzar farma, aur reham kar, aur tu sab raheemon se accha raheem hai”
Yeh ek surat hai jisko humne nazil kiya hai, aur isey humne farz kiya hai, aur is mein humne saaf saaf hidayaat nazil ki hain, shayad ke tum sabaq lo

Zaniya (adulterous) aurat zaani mard, dono mein se har ek ko sau (hundred) kodey (lashes) maaro aur inpar tars khane ka jazba Allah ke deen ke maamle mein tumko daamangeer (pity) na ho agar tum Allah taala aur roz-e-aakhir par iman rakhte ho, aur inko saza detay waqt ehle iman ka ek giroh moujood rahey
